item.title: Meredith add a quote by Dewey the Librarian
item.description: "Patrons of differing outlooks on reality." -- Dewey the Librarian

item.title: Meredith add a quote by Lorraine Peterson
item.description: "Anybody can be cool...but Awesome takes practice." -- Lorraine Peterson

item.title: Meredith add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Meredith add a quote by A.A. Milne
Meredith add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Meredith add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Books are like mirrors: if a fool looks in, you cannot expect a genius to look out." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Meredith add a quote by Gary D. Schmidt
item.description: "Mr. Powell raised an eyebrow. 'I'm a librarian,' he said. 'I always know what I'm talking about." -- Gary D. Schmidt

item.title: Meredith add a quote by Patrick Ness
Meredith add a quote by Kristin Cashore
Meredith add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery
